text: The other day I reported that I had the project I'm working on "stabilized" after major brain surgery. In software it's always a good idea to be prepared for the worst possible outcome. In this case, I forgot that I hadn't deployed the new version to a server, and when I did that, nothing worked. Edge cases. It is once again "stabilized." But the list of new stuff to do is growing, not shrinking. And who knows what broke in the last round of changes.
